pr_title: DDF-6302 Address "Constant names should comply with a naming convention" SonarQube code smells

timeline.message: DDF-6302 Address "Constant names should comply with a naming convention" SonarQube code smells

timeline.bodyText: Notice that I removed the last enum and changed the value here. I think there was a typo, so I updated this from ImplementsResourceld to ImplementsResourceId.
timeline.author: emmberk
